backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, affected files, components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining metadata, fonts, and mounting root for the React app.
frontend/SECURITY.md: Security guidelines outlining recommended headers and best practices for deploying on the Internet Computer.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app routing configuration with shared layout, header, side menu, floating buttons, and footer.
frontend/src/components/BannerCarousel.t: Auto-playing banner carousel with pause-on-interaction, navigation controls, and responsive image handling.
frontend/src/components/CategoryGrid.tsx: Grid of category buttons with validated images that navigate to category gallery pages.
frontend/src/components/FloatingContactB: Fixed-position call and WhatsApp action buttons styled with OKLCH colors.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with menu toggle, brand name, and service location display.
frontend/src/components/icons.tsx: Exports SVG icon components including hamburger, close, phone, and WhatsApp icons.
frontend/src/components/Lightbox.tsx: Fullscreen image viewer with keyboard navigation, next/previous controls, and overlay UI.
frontend/src/components/SideMenu.tsx: Responsive slide-in menu that lists categories, handles outside clicks and Escape key to close, and includes a phone call link.
frontend/src/config/siteData.ts: Defines site metadata such as brand info, contact details, and a list of decor categories with images.
frontend/src/config/siteMedia.ts: Provides banner paths and large image galleries grouped by category.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty module noting all data comes from static assets.
frontend/src/hooks/useSeo.ts: Hook for updating document title and various meta tags including Open Graph and Twitter cards.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with extensive custom theme variables for colors, typography, and accessibility styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root component.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryGalleryPage.t: Displays a category-specific image gallery with SEO setup, image validation, and a lightbox viewer, redirecting home if the category slug is invalid.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with SEO config, a banner carousel, category grid, and feature highlights section.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and container settings with plugins enabled.
project_state.json: Project state file outlining the websiteâ€™s goals, architectural notes, known issues, and existing implemented features.
